heading: HR01401
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED DECLINE IN FOREIGN INVESTMENTS TO THE COUNTRY IN ORDER TO PROPOSE POLICIES THAT WOULD ARREST THE REPORTED DECLINE AND IMPROVE THE COUNTRY'S POSITION IN ATTRACTING FOREIGN INVESTMENTS
status: Pending with the Committee on TRADE AND INDUSTRY since 2017-11-21
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01401
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE REPORTED DECLINE IN FOREIGN INVESTMENTS TO THE COUNTRY IN ORDER TO PROPOSE POLICIES THAT WOULD ARREST THE REPORTED DECLINE AND IMPROVE THE COUNTRY'S POSITION IN ATTRACTING FOREIGN INVESTMENTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2017-10-10
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY ON 2017-11-21
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-10-11;
